prompt_tiers.tier1: The user wants to test the system.
prompt_tiers.tier2: The user's message 'Test' is a simple test to check if the system is functioning correctly and responding to input.

response_tiers.tier2: Your test message was received and processed.  The system is online and functioning as expected.  I'm ready for your next request.
response_tiers.tier3: The system successfully received and processed your test message.  This indicates that communication channels are open and the system is responding to input.  I am now awaiting further instructions or questions.
